pageIntro: A collection of datasets and machine learning notebooks I have created or contributed to during research, hackathons, and personal projects.

items.title: Animals That Destroy Farms In Kenya
items.description: This dataset contains images of seven key animals commonly responsible for farm (shamba) destruction in Kenya: Elephants, Cows, Hippos, Humans, Hyenas, Goats, and Monkeys. These animals contribute to 1/5 of the annual food shortage in Kenya, making reliable detection systems an important area of research.The images were scraped from Google Images and organized into separate directories for each class.

items.title: Voice Phishing Notebook
items.description: This notebook is used to train Transforme Model BERT to detect Scam Calls.

items.title: Voice Phishing Dataset- English and Swahili
items.description: This dataset contains synthetic transcriptions of voice-phishing (vishing) phone calls created in both English and Swahili. It includes two labeled categories: Normal Conversation,Scam / Phishing Conversation The dataset was developed for the 2025 JKUATâ€“Oracle Hackathon (AI for Cybersecurity), with the goal of training a BERT-based model capable of detecting scam calls from voice transcripts.

items.title: Kenyan Roads And Vehicle Dataset
items.description: A notebook that trains a text-generation model (T5-small) to suggest health tasks based on symptoms.
